attributes.action: increase prison sentences for pedophiles and child molesters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: England should have higher prison sentences for pedophiles and child molesters.Too many offenders are being let back on the streets just too abuse another innocent child. Victims range from newborns to teens and they need protection that only the government can enforce. No human has the right to do that to a child and although higher prison sentences wont wipe out the problem completely it is a step in the right direction. We need to build a safer country for our children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
